name: Lost Wings
description:
One day you woke up without your wings.
You don't know what happened, but your peaceful life as a fairy was lost in the moment you lost your wings.
Your former home turns against you, not realising that you are still yourself. While you try to reach the safe heaven and reclaim your wings, you must face the dangers the forest holds and rescue your friends who were trying to help you.

The music was made by @PLaddeXOXO (Twitter)
